sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + "/product/" + id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => setProduct(res.product)); }, []); return ( //using product && to avoid getting error while refreshing product && (

{product.name}

Product # {product._id}

$456.00

- +

Status: In Stock

Description:

Processor: Intel i5-1235U (3.30 GHz up to 4.40 GHz), 10 Cores & 12MB Cache RAM & Storage: 8GB, 8Gx1, DDR4, 2666MHz Ach & 512GB SSD Display & Graphics: 15.6" FHD WVA AG 120Hz 250 nits Narrow Border & Integrated Graphics

Sold by: Amazon

) ); }
